body_html: Actually, I brain'oed. What I actually want to do is put the tag number in the unique int32_t, not the string itself. So @apaszke, we can probably intern the full attr::foobar string (still need the offsets), if you'd likee it!
body_text: Actually, I brain'oed. What I actually want to do is put the tag number in the unique int32_t, not the string itself. So @apaszke, we can probably intern the full attr::foobar string (still need the offsets), if you'd likee it!
body: Actually, I brain'oed. What I actually want to do is put the tag number *in the unique `int32_t`*, not the string itself. So @apaszke, we can probably intern the full `attr::foobar` string (still need the offsets), if you'd likee it!
